pkgmetadata.longdescription: Retrieval Functions for USGS and EPA Hydrology and Water Quality Data // Collection of functions to help retrieve U.S. Geological Survey and U.S. Environmental Protection Agency water quality and hydrology data from web services. Data are discovered from National Water Information System https://waterservices.usgs.gov/ and https://waterdata.usgs.gov/nwis. Water quality data are obtained from the Water Quality Portal https://www.waterqualitydata.us/.
